sales.name: Last Chance: Ski Apparel
sales.description: Ski-ready snow is still falling in the mountains, so be sure to stock up for your alpine escape. Check out our super-chic crop of fur-trimmed parkas, plush pants, insulated jackets, and colorful zipped fleeces suited for hitting the slopes and après-ski lounging. Thanks to trusted names like Columbia, Marker, and Helly Hansen, you’ll be set for whatever the day might bring.

sales.name: Models Off Duty: Casual Chic
sales.description: What do the world’s most fabulous models wear when they’re not working the runways at Fashion Week? Check out the selections in this must-have sale, inspired by Vogue-worthy trendsetters around the globe. These easy, off-duty pieces include layerable items, from French terry jackets and super-soft tees to tank dresses and edgy sweatshirts. Stock up on these effortless faves, but beware: You just might be mistaken for the Next Big Thing.

sales.name: Almost Gone: One-of-a-Kind Kids' Picks
sales.description: Spot a piece with your little one's name on it? Snag it before it's too late — each item in this assortment is the only one of its kind left in stock. Find some of our favorite items for kids, including casual clothes, cozy coats, charming shoes, and more.

sales.name: Sneakers by Saucony, New Balance & More
sales.description: No matter what your fitness routine is — cross-training classes, marathon running, or neighborhood jog — we’ve got you covered with this stylish assortment of sneakers. Step into a pair of bold running shoes from top brands like New Balance and Saucony, known as much for their easy, lightweight fit as their trendy pops of neon. It’s every stylish runner’s dream!

sales.name: Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need
sales.description: Meet the components of classic, versatile style: the everyday dress, the perfect tee, the easy sweater, the satchel, the wedge, the neutral jewel, and the stud earring.

sales.name: Wardrobe Remix: Dresses & Tops
sales.description: Ready to remix your wardrobe for the season? This sale is brimming with a chic selection of picks that take you from errands to the office to date night and more. Slip into everything from slick, embellished tops and elegant knits to cool, printed frocks and plenty of classy LBDs. Top with a blazer for the boardroom and stiletto stunners for a night on the town.

sales.name: Tweezerman
sales.description: The allure of a perfectly arched brow is undeniable and easy to achieve with the right arsenal of tools. Who better to turn to than the go-to choice of beauty professionals and celebrities alike? Choose from some of Tweezerman's bestselling picks here, from the Slant tweezers to the on-the-go mini tweezer sets. The selection goes beyond brows too: Think Sole Mate foot files, manicure kits, magnifying mirrors, and chic cases to carry your new essentials in style.

sales.name: Refresh Your Jewelry Box
sales.description: Can a woman ever have too much jewelry? Not if you ask us — and you'll agree when you lay eyes on the finds we've rounded up. Reinvent your jewelry collection with the dazzling pieces on offer here: We've got elaborate crystal bib necklaces, classic watches accented with diamonds, turquoise drop earrings, and more from some of your favorite designer names.

sales.name: Almost Gone: One-of-a-Kind Apparel
sales.description: On the hunt for that signature piece to complete your wardrobe? Good news — it’s one-stop shopping in this sale, which features standout dresses, sweaters, pants, and more from an unprecedented list of our favorite designer names. But don’t hesitate — these incredible deals won’t last long!

sales.name: 50 Scarves to Wear Now & Later
sales.description: Whether you're thinking about bundling up or have spring accessories in mind — these colorful scarves are just the ticket. And with 50 of the most vibrant, textural iterations on offer here, you’ll have a hard time selecting just one to wrap yourself in. From fringe cashmere to tie-dye prints, we've got something to add some serious panache to your ensemble.

sales.name: Leather & Wrap Bracelets Feat. Presh
sales.description: If you’re anything like us, you love to pile on your jewelry. Wrap bracelets are perfect for layering up, especially when fashioned in chic, embellished leather like our picks today. Choose your favorites from this of-the-moment array. You’ll find leather tinted with metallics and other unexpected hues, and styles adorned with plenty of edge: Think crystals, studs, and chains galore.

sales.name: Weather-Ready: Winter Boots & Accessories
sales.description: With icy storms looming, be sure you're set to battle the cold. And to help you out, we’ve gathered an assortment of must-have winter wares that are guaranteed to keep you toasty and looking stylish too! You’ll find an array of comfy boots: Think shearling-lined slip-ons, fringe-adorned styles, and tall, lace-up numbers. We’ve also got cozy scarves, knit caps, gloves, and more to complete the look. Let it snow!

sales.name: Rain Boots Feat. Aigle, Seavees & More
sales.description: If you’re prone to rainy-day blues, you’ll change your tune once you see this collection of can't-wait-to-wear-them rain shoes! This fun-filled sale features boots in vibrant hues and playful patterns (pretty florals and plaid!), along with styles accented with fitting buckle straps and artful lacing — all are sure to brighten up those overcast days.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry by Marco Bicego
sales.description: This jewelry is truly the stuff of which jewelry lovers' dreams are made. Gold and pearls glimmer in abundance, and fans of Marco Bicego's Old World aesthetic will find plenty to covet, from briolette drop earrings and dainty pendants to color-flecked station necklaces and multi-strand bracelets. And have we mentioned the elegant stone rings? To die for.

sales.name: Inhabit
sales.description: What two words best describe beloved knitwear line Inhabit? Sexy wearability. And our luxe selection from the New York-based label is packed with easy, sophisticated staples you’re sure to fall in love with. This season, you’ll be living in these soft asymmetrical tees, trim cardigans, sleek turtlenecks, and much more — trust us.

sales.name: Tart
sales.description: Ready for an all-new lineup of fresh Tart styles? The leggings, tops, maxis, and minis in this sale are designed for maximum comfort — and maximum style. We've got a selection of super-flattering frocks, boasting everything from trendy colorblocking to high-low hems perfect for a night on the town. You’ll also find knit jackets, draped tops, and plenty of splashy prints. Just add heels and you'll be ready to strut your stuff.

sales.name: SPANX® Shapewear & Hosiery
sales.description: When it comes to the ultimate fashion secret, style-savvy girls will all tell you the same thing: It’s all about Spanx. Shop this amazing collection of the must-have shapewear, adored by celebrities from Jennifer Garner to Emily Blunt: Think slimming camisoles and tanks, high-rise briefs, shorts, footless tights, and more.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Gifts: Diamonds, Gemstones, Estate & More
sales.description: Every woman has her go-to baubles, but sometimes the occasion calls for something truly special. Go beyond your basics in favor of decidedly glamorous picks  — you’ll find striking rings, necklaces, bracelets, and more from some of the most sought-after designer names. Indulge in a bevy of beautifully unique stones, including aquamarine, smoky quartz, tourmaline, pink sapphires, and moonstone. Not to mention, we’re showcasing timelessly elegant watches, glittering diamond rings, and delicate gold pendants that add just the right dose of luxe.
